definitions.text: the amount of 3-dimensional space occupied by an object
examples: the gas expanded to twice its original volume

definitions.text: the property of something that is great in magnitude
examples: it is cheaper to buy it in bulk
he received a mass of correspondence

definitions.text: physical objects consisting of a number of pages bound together
examples: he used a large book as a doorstop

definitions.text: a publication that is one of a set of several similar publications
examples: he asked for the 1989 volume of the Annual Review
mix one volume of the solution with ten volumes of water

definitions.text: the magnitude of sound (usually in a specified direction)
examples: the kids played their music at full volume
